metadata.title: USN-6472-1 -- GNU Scientific Library vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that GNU Scientific Library incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6472-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libgsl27 - 2.7.1+dfsg-3ubuntu0.23.04.1 libgslcblas0 - 2.7.1+dfsg-3ubuntu0.23.04.1 gsl-bin - 2.7.1+dfsg-3ubuntu0.23.04.1 libgsl-dev - 2.7.1+dfsg-3ubuntu0.23.04.1 No subscription required
